article_title: ILWU, PMA reach tentative agreement on health benefits
article_text:

article_metadata.description: The International Longshore and Warehouse Union and the Pacific Maritime Association released a joint statement on Tuesday saying they have come together on at least one topic, and a highly contentious one at that: health benefits.

og.description: The International Longshore and Warehouse Union and the Pacific Maritime...
